item.title: My first Hugo post using TopHat theme
item.description: What is this? This is my first Hugo site, and the theme is powered by the amazingly clean and compact TopHat theme! What can it do? Well, because this entire site was written in MarkDown, a very easy to use “programming language” changes can be made very easily! MarkDown supports the HTML basics, such as bold text, italicized text, headers, underlined text, etc. so I will attempt to use them in the section below!
